sig_info: Anti-Venom gains a Passive Regeneration stack that recovers 15.15 to 51.59% of the Attack Damage taken from a non-Critical Hit over 25 seconds and is interrupted if the Klyntar Debuff is Purified.

Personal Debuffs potency is increased by 10%, for every 10 hits in the Combo Meter from either Champion. Non-personal Debuffs are increased by 5% for every 10 hits in the Combo Meter. Effect caps at 50 hits.
